Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piayolovoroc m~marturoc: Apanoub piremneh/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: O struggle-mantled martyr: Apa-Noub of Nehis: that He may forgive us our sins.
